channel.title: Eigenharp always playing the same note when using mpe
channel.description:
So, I'm finally getting around to using mpe with the Axoloti, and I'm having some issues. My setup goes, Eigenharp Alpha (MIDI with Poly channel set) -> EigenD -> USB-MIDI out to Axoloti -> MPE synth. When I play notes, the base note is always the same, but I know that MPE is working because I can play multiple notes and bend them different directions. Is this something that anyone else has come across?
If I load a standard MIDI Axoloti patch, the base notes play correctly.
